about_the_game:
Enter the Infinity Trials, an action-packed, fast-paced, rogue-lite where you'll explore mysterious worlds and fight fierce enemies with sword and bow.

Lost in a dense forest, you find yourself facing dangerous creatures that won't hesitate to attack you. But as you defeat them, something strange happens: you get teleported to another universe, where new enemies challenge you. Can you survive all verses and defeat the hordes of variants thrown your way?

Begin your journey wielding a swift yet straightforward sword and bow, gradually enhancing your prowess as you unveil potent artifacts. These mystical relics hail from diverse realms, each offering unique power-ups. While some are as uncomplicated as basic spinach, boosting your strength, others harbor mythological might, like the legendary sword Excalibur.

Ultra fast precision combat

One hit kills enemies and one hit kills you. The fast paced combat requires you to move quickly and kill quickly as the faster you kill the more gems you earn. The gems are used for powerful artifacts from various universes which will help you kill faster and earn more gems to buy more Artifacts. The Artifacts will quickly make you into a instant killing machine where dozens of enemies will perish with each swing of a sword or arrow from the bow. While speed is of the essence, so is grace and accuracy. A swing and a miss will make very exposed to enemy hits.

Claim the top spot

Claim your place on the leaderboards! Only a perfect run will yield the perfect score!

highlighted.name: You can do this all day

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Infinity Trials

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Enter the Infinity Trials, an action-packed fast-paced rogue-lite. Fight off waves of dangerous creatures and collect artifacts to enhance your abilities. With each victory, you'll be teleported to a new world, each with unique challenges and enemies.
